bioconda.name: plass
bioconda.summary: Plass (Protein-Level ASSembler) and PenguiN (Protein-guided Nucleotide assembler) are methods to assemble short read sequencing data on a protein level to proteins or DNA contigs

biocontainers.name: plass
biocontainers.summary: Plass (Protein-Level ASSembler) is a software to assemble short read sequencing data on a protein level

biotools.summary: Protein-Level ASSembler (PLASS): sensitive and precise protein assembler

bioschemas.name: Plass
bioschemas.summary: Protein-Level ASSembler (PLASS): sensitive and precise protein assembler
